stories.title: Roundup of Bootstrappers Breakfast Events in January 2022
My Hypothetical Day as a Substitute Teacher: Raytracing Is Fun for Everyone

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I have a long list of things to learn but I always try to keep one or two languages, API's or even things to tinker with (hackrf, arduino, rpi...) on my radar. But there is so much stuff out there I can't tell what is a fad and what has actual value.

What has been a rewarding experience that also has value that you would recommend as a leanrning goal?

For context: this is for personal development not a career/professional pursuit.
stories.title: Ask HN: What new project or tech is worth learning in 2022?

stories.text:
What are some great tech talks recommended by the HN community in 2021?

Note: Even talks recorded before 2021 is fine. I am looking for talks to watch during the holiday break.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Tech Talks of 2021
A/A Testing: How I increased conversions 300% by doing absolutely nothing (2015)
TinyNES – NES-compatible open hardware video game console
Desmond Tutu: Body of South African hero to be aquamated
